/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, a main artery of the city, is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and urban architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the entire scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, highlighting the vibrant colors and intricate details of the cityscape.
